items.title: Thailand to offer US more trade concessions to avert 36% tariff
items.description: (Bloomberg) -- Thailand is making a last-ditch effort to avert a punitive 36% export levy threatened by the Trump administration with offers of greater market access for US farm and industrial goods, along with increased purchases of energy and Boeing jets.
